moreBlocks.articles:
• Bailey & Galyen, Attorneys at Law
    Bailey & Galyen is one of the largest consumer law firms in Texas and has recovered many millions of dollars on behalf of injured people in Texas, Florida and Missouri.
  • About Our Firm
    The Houston / Dallas law firm of Bailey & Galyen is among the largest "consumer law firms" in the state of Texas with over 30 attorneys and multiple offices across Texas as well as in Florida and Missouri.
  • Bailey & Galyen
    At Bailey & Galyen, our experienced lawyers practice in wide ranging areas of the law.
  • Our Practice Areas
    Bailey & Galyen is one of the "consumer law firms" in the state of Texas with an expanding, nationwide practice currently serving clients throughout Texas, Florida and Missouri.

description:
Whatever challenge you currently face — criminal charges, a child custody battle, workplace injury or any of our many practice areas — the attorneys of Bailey & Galyen in Weatherford, Texas, has one top priority: solving your legal puzzle.™

In and around Weatherford, one multipractice firm is known for its depth of knowledge and breadth of legal experience: Bailey & Galyen.

Bailey & Galyen works to sort out the many complex issues the people of east Texas deal with: divorce, traffic tickets, tax problems, filing for bankruptcy, disability claims, immigration, and the legal concerns of businesses, corporations, and employers.

Big firm results, small firm energy: That's the formula we use to deliver 100 percent representation every time.

A large number of our lawyers are certified as experts by the Board of Legal Specialization to work in the areas of family law, criminal law and personal injury.

Our determination is evident in our results. It is not uncommon for our litigators to win judgments of $1 million and more. We successfully led a class action suit against a drug company that awarded $108 million to our clients. The GetLegal.com website designated Bailey & Galyen as "Eminent Law Firm of the Year."

Affordability and convenience are part of our service. We offer a free first consultation, credit card payments, visits to home or hospital, and a 24-hour phone center. Numerous attorneys speak Spanish.

As much as we enjoy such success, our relationships are even more important to us. We earn confidence by conducting ourselves professionally and doing superior work. If expertise and experience and expertise are important considerations for you, consider the law firm of Bailey & Galyen.
